hero_description: We combine passion and experience to provide innovative solutions supporting the development of industry and education.Your success is our priority!
serious_info_description_1: We support the development of your industry and education through the implementation of comprehensive solutions in the field of research and education, selection and sale of tools as well as purchase and supply of oils and biocomponents.Our goal is to enable your company to achieve full potential and performance.
serious_info_description_2_1: We have many years of experience - we have been operating on the market since 2003.
serious_info_description_2_2: We use modern research methods and apparatus.
serious_info_description_2_3: We guarantee the reliability and timeliness of the services provided.
serious_info_description_2_4: We care about the confidentiality of our clients' information.
serious_info_alt_1: Target icon with an arrow stuck
fancy_info_title_1: Educational positions of the car industry
fancy_info_description_1: We provide modern educational stations for schools and training centers, helping future mechanics to acquire practical skills.
fancy_info_description_2: We offer high -quality uco oils, environmentally friendly, which can be used in various applications, e.g. biofuels.
fancy_info_description_3: We provide a wide selection of industrial tools for various applications, from mechanical workshops to production plants.
fancy_info_alt_1: Icon depicting a car on a lift
location_info: The company's headquarters is in Osielsk - next to Bydgoszcz!
